desc: Greatly boosts BC, HC, Zel, Karma, and Item drop rate

dictionary.lore:
"How stupid! Are you going to give up your life for a little pocket change? The treasure that you should really be protecting is somewhere else, isn't it?"

(An excerpt from Chapter 1, Section 2 of "The Adventures of the Chivalrous Thief Zelnite and the Impostor Noble's Daughter!")

name: Thief Cloak
